Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: the SDK is simply relaying the error message from the backend. the message has meta characters in it that seems to need fix in the peer code. moving this to the peer component.

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: attachStdout). Can you look to see if that helps debugging compilation/build issues and request closure please ? >

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: Tested this with the latest fabric and fabric-sdk-node. I introduced a syntax error in example_cc.go and I see the error message displayed correctly on both the fabric and fabric-sdk-node sides. See output in attached text document for further details.
